name: 10th Day of Christmas - Gathering In A Box BUY NOW
description:
On the 10th Day of Christmas, Egg & Dart showed me how to put together a festive gathering with a gift box filled with 4 vintage style toasting glasses with quotes to be toasted by guests, 4 vintage style mercury glass votive holders and several springs of shimmering swag to create an easy centerpiece on a table or mantle, all topped off with a store favorite book Small Gatherings with step by step instructions on preparing and enjoying your festivities!  A great hostess gift and fantastic for anyone planning a little something for New Year's!

Set includes a gift wrapped box with bow filled with:
(4) Vintage style champagne coupe glasses with printed paper quotes
(4) Vintage style mercury glass votive holders (battery operated votives included)
(3) 12" sprigs of shimmering faux greenery for decorating a tabletop or mantle
(1) Hardcover copy of Small Gatherings, a wonderfully easy guide to organizing and enjoying your own gathering with beautiful imagery and time saving tips

Complimentary gift wrap and ground shipping on this gift - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

name: 11th Day of Christmas - Pretty Paperwhites and Festive Amaryllis
description:
This antiqued zinc bucket contains everything you need to give the gift of blooming Paperwhites or Amaryllis all topped with a bow and some greens!  Perfect for friends with or without a green thumb - the foolproof garden for blooming flowers!

Contains 5" diameter zinc pot with soil, three double bulbs of Paperwhites or one large Amaryllis bulb and a little Spanish moss to cover your soil and keep your gift looking beautiful right up through blooms appear!

Add a hardcover copy of 66 Square Feet to the mix to cater to the avid gardener of small spaces!  This book includes a month by month guide of planting, harvesting and menu making all from 66 Square Feet in New York - just don't eat the Paperwhites or Amaryllis and stick to the delicious recipes featured in this wonderful gardening edition!

With this gift, Egg & Dart offers complimentary ground shipping - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

name: 12th Day of Christmas - Books ship free! BUY NOW
description:
On the twelfth day of Christmas my true love sent to me.... the gift of Egg & Dart's carefully curated books.  As an art gallery, we are pretty particular about what we carry in our Newport shop.  Books are a staple for us and we are continually inspired by fellow artists, chefs and even pocket guides.  Books from Egg & Dart ship free through December - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

Love giving our books as much as we do?  We will send your gift recipient a selection of 12 books to last throughout the year.  For them, their gift receiving kicks off with an email notifying them of their upcoming gift and for you, because you're so giving, you deserve a book from us too!  Additionally, you will receive a discount on your purchase and we will take care of the shipping!

options.name: 12 Months of Books Curated by Egg & Dart
6 Months of Books Curated by Egg & Dart
3 Months of Books Curated by Egg & Dart

name: Home Made Winter BUY NOW
description:
Yvette van Boven's WINTER book is all about comforting winter food, with inspiration from Ireland, France and Holland, the countries where she has lived and lives. There are simple recipes for classics that everyone thought they were difficult to make, such as croquettes, pulled pork and apple cider. Step by step guides for making butter for example, the Dutch ‘Ossenworst’ sausage or Baileys. I also give recipes for things we eat on winter holidays: like Plum Pudding for Christmas, Colcannon on Halloween, Galette des Rois on Epiphany.

"Just like with Home Made, I did everything in this very personal cookbook myself again: the design, the illustrations and I prepared all the dishes for photography. The pictures were taken by my husband, photographer Oof Verschuren," describes Boven.

One of our first books at Egg & Dart, has been a great success - gorgeous photography makes this not only a beautiful cookbook, but also a lovely coffee table book.  Free shipping on books through the end of December - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

name: Peephole Box Ornaments by Chris Wyllie BUY NOW
description:
Every year Chris Wyllie puts together whimsical ornaments riddled with craftsmanship and nostalgia of Christmas Past.  These table ornaments are handcrafted in Newport, Rhode Island where Chris typically spends holidays with family.  One side depicts an image, and all the others are wrapped with handmade paper and feature a peephole on the opposite side revealing a second image, all topped with a bow ready to give as the most creative gift you will give this year.  This piece comes from Chris Wyllie's 8th Annual Ornament Collection.

Assorted Ornaments, 2013
By Chris Wyllie
Paper with metal and glass peephole, fabric bow.
Measurements: 4" Square.
Signed by the artist on the bottom panel.  

Chris Wyllie’s work comments on the period 1948 – 1968, a time depicting the height of American culture and the pursuit of happiness.  He describes the years following, 1968 – present, as “just past happy”, with his paintings of images of beauty and desire set on aging found objects.  The artist and gallery co-owner further explores the concept of discarding the old in order to make room for the new.

name: Small Gatherings Book BUY NOW
description:
From inspirational imagery to menu managing, this book is the perfect companion to the ever planning host or hostess. Give them the gift of Small Gatherings - and allow them to learn quick tips for simple preparations so they can enjoy the best things about entertaining - spending more time with their guests!  Broken down into chapters by season, find a step by step guid to making easy, yet imaginative recipes and setting gorgeous tables.  A shop favorite!

Through December, books ship free from Egg & Dart - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

name: HOME MADE BUY NOW
description:
How do you make cheese from pantry staples? How do you create an oven smoker from scratch in just  two minutes? How do you make ice cream without an ice cream machine? And how can you use your homemade cheese, smoked fish, ice cream and many other products in original recipes? In this cookbook Yvette explains all of this. In clear step-by-step stories illustrated instructions, you’re encouraged to learn and prepare new cooking techniques without needing to run to the store to buy expensive ingredients or complicated kitchen gadgets. After reading this book, you’ll be able to say that everything you cook is HOME MADE.

The book begins with breakfast and works its way through the day: how to bake your own bread in the morning and fix a healthy and original lunch after that, towards the afternoon: how to make your own brewed tea, bake cakes, the happy hour: how to make your own drinks, liqueur, how to make nibbles and bites, the evening: dinner, cheese, dessert, through the night: how to make mustard, ketchup and mayonnaise for those who need something to eat, after a night out at the pub. There are even recipes for doggy treats. The book ends with menus: assembled with the recipes, to combine to dinners or buffets for all occasions.

Home made is all about making everything yourself, and so did Yvette van Boven to make this book: She made her own fonts, drew the illustrations, wrote all the recipes, prepared the food for the photographs  and designed the book. Her husband, photographer Oof Verschuren, took all the beautiful images.

Yvette van Boven (Ireland, 1968) divides her time between Amsterdam and Paris. She is a freelance food stylist and recipe writer and owns, together with her cousin, a restaurant and catering company in Amsterdam. She also illustrates books and magazines. Her work appears regularly in magazines such as Delicious., Elle Food, Flow, Margriet, newspapers and books.

Through December, books ship free from Egg & Dart - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!

name: Etta + Billie Lotion BUY NOW
description:
Calming lavender soothes and protects. Hydrating + nourishing body lotion for all skin types. Formulated with natural skin reviving ingredients like antioxidant rich organic cocoa butter, soothing organic aloe, softening coconut oil + vitamin rich sunflower oil. 

Bright citrusy bergamot + spicy fresh ginger invigorate your skin and your senses. Hydrating + nourishing body lotion for all skin types. Formulated with natural skin reviving ingredients like antioxidant rich organic cocoa butter, soothing organic aloe, softening coconut oil + vitamin rich sunflower oil. 

Born from a desire to master a tradesman’s hobby, and an awareness to develop product free of cheap chemical laden ingredients found in most bath + body products on the market, Alana Rivera realized that making her own products enabled her to feed her bath + body addiction while giving her creative freedom and control over the health of her routine.

The creative process began with learning the science of cold process soap making. From there, she began researching, creating, and experimenting with a variety of products + ingredients. Her focus and interest grew with a consciousness for all natural + organic ingredients. This drive to innovate, with a consciousness for the natural, led Alana to study Herbalism, allowing her to incorporate the healing + soothing power of herbs + essential oils into all Etta + Billie products - The Soap Maven, and Etta + Billie were born!

Little know fact:  Etta + Billie is named after two monumental women, the founder’s grandmothers. Grandma Etta + Grandma Billie inspired Alana, and in naming her business after them she honors the selflessness, tenacity, support + courage of all women.

name: Etta + Billie Soap Gift Set BUY NOW
description:
This limited edition gift set comes with one bar of Etta + Billie's seasonal Spiked Egg Nog soap + one bar of Etta + Billie's Chai Tea soap all wrapped up and topped with a bow and tiny bulb ornaments and a blank sparkly gift tag.  This is the best dressed gift, ready to be given - and the best really is inside with two artisanal limited edition small batch soaps by Etta + Billie!

SPIKED EGG NOG A limited edition scent inspired by the classic holiday beverage. Spicy warming nutmeg creates a cozy aroma while pasture raised egg yolks and Straus Creamery certified organic milk to keep skin hydrated and conditioned. Of course, Egg Nog wouldn't be complete without a nip of bourbon. Please bathe responsibly.

CHAI TEA The warming spicy aroma of cinnamon, cardamom and nutmeg meld with the creamy richness of whole organic milk.

Born from a desire to master a tradesman’s hobby, and an awareness to develop product free of cheap chemical laden ingredients found in most bath + body products on the market, Alana Rivera realized that making her own products enabled her to feed her bath + body addiction while giving her creative freedom and control over the health of her routine.

The creative process began with learning the science of cold process soap making. From there, she began researching, creating, and experimenting with a variety of products + ingredients. Her focus and interest grew with a consciousness for all natural + organic ingredients. This drive to innovate, with a consciousness for the natural, led Alana to study Herbalism, allowing her to incorporate the healing + soothing power of herbs + essential oils into all Etta + Billie products - The Soap Maven, and Etta + Billie were born!

Little know fact:  Etta + Billie is named after two monumental women, the founder’s grandmothers. Grandma Etta + Grandma Billie inspired Alana, and in naming her business after them she honors the selflessness, tenacity, support + courage of all women.

name: Etta + Billie Soap BUY NOW
description:
SPIKED EGG NOG A limited edition scent inspired by the classic holiday beverage. Spicy warming nutmeg creates a cozy aroma while pasture raised egg yolks and Straus Creamery certified organic milk to keep skin hydrated and conditioned. Of course, Egg Nog wouldn't be complete without a nip of bourbon. Please bathe responsibly.

ANISE PEPPERMINT Refreshing peppermint blends with slightly sweet anise, creating a unique unisex scent. Activated charcoal detoxifies and deodorizes. This makes a great kitchen soap.

CEDARWOOD A rich, fresh + woodsy scent. Activated charcoal and rhassoul clay detoxify and smooth. Perfect for men.

CHAI TEA The warming spicy aroma of cinnamon, cardamom and nutmeg meld with the creamy richness of whole organic milk.

HORCHATA Creamy vitamin rich rice milk + sweet warming cinnamon blend in this Horchata inspired soap. Kiwi seeds gently exfoliate. Almost better than the drink.

CITRUS POPPY SEED An uplifting blend of bright fresh orange and lemon with a touch of subtly earthy spicy lemongrass. Organic poppy seeds gently exfoliate. Yellow clay detoxifies and organic grapefruit peel adds antioxidants.

LAVENDER Floral, fresh, slightly herbaceous lavender soothes + calms. The perfect addition to a relaxing bath or shower. Crushed organic lavender buds provide gentle exfoliation + organic French lavender oil gives this bar its divine scent.

Born from a desire to master a tradesman’s hobby, and an awareness to develop product free of cheap chemical laden ingredients found in most bath + body products on the market, Alana Rivera realized that making her own products enabled her to feed her bath + body addiction while giving her creative freedom and control over the health of her routine.

The creative process began with learning the science of cold process soap making. From there, she began researching, creating, and experimenting with a variety of products + ingredients. Her focus and interest grew with a consciousness for all natural + organic ingredients. This drive to innovate, with a consciousness for the natural, led Alana to study Herbalism, allowing her to incorporate the healing + soothing power of herbs + essential oils into all Etta + Billie products - The Soap Maven, and Etta + Billie were born!

Little know fact:  Etta + Billie is named after two monumental women, the founder’s grandmothers. Grandma Etta + Grandma Billie inspired Alana, and in naming her business after them she honors the selflessness, tenacity, support + courage of all women.

name: Party Hats by Chris Wyllie BUY NOW
description:
Party Hats depicts a group of children stand together posing with their party hats and clothing in pastel colors.  The first of its kind, Chris Wyllie paints on the backside of a "SLOW CHILDREN PLAYING" sign found in a Connecticut antiques store.

Party Hats, 2013
By Chris Wyllie
Oil on found object.
Signature engraved on lower right on pink party dress of child.
Mounted with a French Cleat, comes with hanging materials.
Measurements: 18" x 24"

Chris Wyllie’s work comments on the period 1948 – 1968, a time depicting the height of American culture and the pursuit of happiness.  He describes the years following, 1968 – present, as “just past happy”, with his paintings of images of beauty and desire set on aging found objects.  The artist and gallery co-owner further explores the concept of discarding the old in order to make room for the new.

GRAPEFRUIT CARDAMOM Scented with an exotic spicy blend of fresh pink grapefruit + sultry cardamom.

LAVENDAR Floral, fresh and slightly herbaceous French lavender oil will soothe and calm.

name: Porcelain Mason Jar, Dairy Bottles, Chemist Bottle BUY NOW
description:
A simple Ball Mason Jar is the inspiration for this ceramic vase. Mason Jars bring a feeling of country nostalgia. The white, unglazed porcelain has a beautiful mat ivory finish.
Don't worry, it will still hold water. Fired porcelain is extremely dense and glass like.
Size: 4.5'' tall x 2.75'' wide, opening measures: 2'' in diameter

The bottle has raised lettering. Front reads: “this bottle property of and filled by Wieland Dairy Company, Chicago IL One Quart” Back reads: “One Quart sealed-11 not to be sold, wash and return” 
Size: 8’’ h x 3.25’’ wide, opening measures: 1.5’’ diameter

A very cool antique glass milk bottle has been replicated in porcelain to create a beautiful white flower vase. This nostalgic design would fit right in with any decor be it modern, shabby chic or country!  The front of the vase reads, "quality blue ribbon" "made in the USA"... The back reads, "one pint" "wash and recycle"
Size: 6'' tall x 2.5'' wide, opening measures: 1.5'' in diameter

Recreated from an antique glass chemistry bottle. (shown in second photo) Front reads: “The Maltine MFG CO Chemists New York” This bottle is made from raw, unglazed porcelain. It will hold water as a vase.
Size: 6.5'' tall x 2.75'' wide opening measures: 1'' in diameter

name: Molly Muriel Soy Candles BUY NOW
description:
Natural soy candles, hand poured in a plain, reusable glass with delectable scents.  Candles are individually packaged in a kraft carton and then wrapped for the holidays here at Egg & Dart before shipping to you!  7oz.

Embrace: (Bergamot Cedarwood) Let the deep, rich aroma of this sultry blend transform your senses as the warmth embraces you.

Spice It Up: (Cinnamon Clove) This exotic blend of delicious aroma is perfect when you’re ready to spice things up.

Perfect Harmony: (Lavendar Eucalyptus) Be inspired to find your inner tranquility as the aromas of lavender and eucalyptus blend and mingle.

All signed and dated by the artist in Newport, RI

name: Willie Saint James Orignal Sky Scape Painting BUY NOW
description:
Willie Saint James is a nom de plume created to protect the identity of a well known artist thriving in his career in order to be able to offer affordable art.  Willie Saint James' Sky Scapes have been a growing phenomena in anticipation of the artist's identity being revealed in December of 2017!  

Sky Scape by Willie Saint James
Acrylic on recycled wood 
8"x8" framed 
*Please note paintings are one of a kind and may differ in detail
Be sure to register your paintings at williesaintjames@yahoo.com to learn the identity of the artist in December of 2017.

A note from Willie Saint James: Ever since I can remember I have loved painting landscapes. As the years have passed I have been very fortunate to earn my living as an artist. However as my work has increased in value it has become more difficult for young people and new collectors to appreciate my work. Thus Willie Saint James, my nom de plume so to speak, was born. Hopefully under this name I can offer my work as affordable art for all.

name: Tie-dye Tea Towel Set of 2 BUY NOW
description: Hand dyed oversized tea towels in sets of two.  A touch nautical, a little hippy and very New England.  All sets are close in style, but sets are chosen at random (stripes, rings, abstract).  30" x 38" cotton flour sack tea towels tie-dyed in Newport, Rhode Island.

name: Arrow Collection BUY NOW
description: Each unique, gently worn arrow is given new life by being part of a collection.  Start your collection today.  Each arrow sold separately and selected at random.  These are not meant to be used as arrows and are intended as decoration only.  Most are in need of love with dings, missing feathers and tips.  Each piece is a work in itself.

name: Sweets & Bitters Vol 2 BUY NOW
description:
Entertaining well is more about graciousness and class than showy cooking. Sweets & Bitters Vol 2 gives you ideas for fun food that you could make right now. Pick up the phone, turn on the stove, and have someone over for dinner tonight. These menus blur the lines between making-do and celebrating.

In this issue, you'll find inspiration for a bodega taco party, lessons on classic cocktail technique, recipes for a decadent brunch, and more!

The darling DIY guide to throwing dinner parties, packing picnics and arranging flowers - Vol 2.  Find everything you need to know to be the hostess with the mostest or give to your favorite entertaining girl or guy.  Free shipping through December - Happy Holidays from our home to yours!
